text: 2. Hold the “a” key to rotate the mask to the left until the painted aside first appears.
3. Use the “a” to advance the video one frame at a time, stopping when it first looks convex.
4. Use the “d” key to reverse the video one frame at a time until it looks concave.
5. Use the “a” and “d” keys to identify the value (displayed below the mask) where the mask first looks convex.
